topics.name: Motivation
topics.description: Inspirational quotes to boost your motivation and drive

topics.name: Success
topics.description: Quotes about achieving success and reaching your goals

topics.name: Wisdom
topics.description: Timeless wisdom and life lessons from great thinkers

topics.name: Love
topics.description: Beautiful quotes about love, relationships, and connection

topics.name: Leadership
topics.description: Quotes about leadership, influence, and making a difference

topics.name: Creativity
topics.description: Quotes to inspire creativity and innovation

motivation.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
motivation.author: Steve Jobs

motivation.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
motivation.author: Winston Churchill

motivation.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
motivation.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

motivation.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
motivation.author: Sam Levenson
motivation.reference: In One Era and Out the Other, 1973

motivation.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
motivation.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

success.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
success.author: Winston Churchill

success.text: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
success.author: Colin R. Davis

success.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
success.author: Albert Schweitzer
success.reference: Out of My Life and Thought, 1933

success.text: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
success.author: Vince Lombardi
success.reference: What It Takes to Be Number One, 1970

success.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
success.author: Henry David Thoreau

wisdom.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
wisdom.author: Socrates

wisdom.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
wisdom.author: John Lennon

wisdom.text: The unexamined life is not worth living.
wisdom.author: Socrates

wisdom.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
wisdom.author: Nelson Mandela

love.text: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
love.author: Audrey Hepburn

love.text: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
love.author: Aristotle

love.text: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved.
love.author: Victor Hugo

love.text: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you have been together. Love is about how much you love each other every single day.
love.author: Anonymous

love.text: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
love.author: David Viscott
love.reference: How to Live with Another Person, 1974

leadership.text: The supreme quality for leadership is unquestionably integrity.
leadership.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

leadership.text: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality.
leadership.author: Warren Bennis

leadership.text: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
leadership.author: John C. Maxwell

leadership.text: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
leadership.author: Ralph Nader

leadership.text: Leadership and learning are indispensable to each other.
leadership.author: John F. Kennedy

creativity.text: The creative adult is the child who survived.
creativity.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

creativity.text: Every artist was first an amateur.
creativity.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

creativity.text: The world is but a canvas to the imagination.
creativity.author: Henry David Thoreau
creativity.reference: A Week on the Concord and Merrimack Rivers, 1849
